title: Dyson Ball Animal 3 Extra Upright Vacuum Cleaner
description: Brand new Dyson Ball Animal 3 Extra upright vacuum cleaner with advanced Radial Root Cyclone technology for strong suction. Features a high torque cleaner head that adapts suction to different floor types, whole-machine HEPA filtration, and a tangle-free turbine tool ideal for pet hair. Lightweight design for easy maneuverability. Comes with multiple tools including combination, crevice, and stair tools. Perfect for homes with pets and heavy-duty cleaning needs.

meta.title: Dyson Ball Animal 3 Extra Upright Vacuum Cleaner - HappyDeel
meta.description: Brand new Dyson Ball Animal 3 Extra upright vacuum cleaner with advanced Radial Root Cyclone technology for strong suction. Ideal for pet hair and deep cleaning.
